name: I Hate Puppets
description:
I Hate Puppets, a sequel to a FNAF parody that has no swearing whatsoever.

This is a sequel to my game "I Hate People" which you can find at https://zapizard.itch.io/ihatepeople

In this game you play as Kermit, after Elmo goes missing you pass out and wake up in an office building with a bunch of idiots, and you're the 7th.

Music in this game is from Party in Backyard.
